title: [已莫名自行解决]求助如何解决第一次构建fabric示例mod时fabric-loom无法下载的...
author: huan2huan2
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huan2huan2 于 2020-4-17 21:38 编辑 

小白；
构建1.14.4的fabric-example-mod-master；build.gradle和gradle.properties已按照https://modmuss50.me/fabric.html修改；使用gradlew genSources后出现以下错误：
FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* Where:
Build file 'D:\Gaming\fabricmod\fabric-example-mod-master\fabric-example-mod-master\build.gradle' line: 2

* What went wrong:
Plugin [id: 'fabric-loom', version: '0.2.7-SNAPSHOT'] was not found in any of the following sources:

- Gradle Core Plugins (not a core plugin, please see https://docs.gradle.org/6.3/userguide/standard_plugins.html for available core plugins)
- Plugin Repositories (could not resolve plugin artifact 'fabric-loom:fabric-loom.gradle.plugin:0.2.7-SNAPSHOT')
  Searched in the following repositories:
    BintrayJCenter
    Fabric(https://maven.fabricmc.net/)
    Gradle Central Plugin Repository

* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. Run with --scan to get full insights.

* Get more help at https://help.gradle.org

BUILD FAILED in 2m 22s复制代码
感觉是网络问题，开上网道具试了一下，只是最后的BUILD FAILED的时间短了一点；
又尝试使用了Lss233大佬的镜像：
settings.gradle
pluginManagement {
   repositories {
      jcenter()
      maven {
         url = 'https://lss233.com/artifactory/minecraft'
      }
      gradlePluginPortal()
   }
}复制代码
出现错误如下：
FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
A problem occurred configuring root project 'fabric-example-mod-master'.
> Could not resolve all artifacts for configuration ':classpath'.
   > Could not find fabric-loom.gradle.plugin-0.2.7-SNAPSHOT.jar (fabric-loom:fabric-loom.gradle.plugin:0.2.7-SNAPSHOT:20200406.142940-30).
     Searched in the following locations:
         https://lss233.com/artifactory/minecraft/fabric-loom/fabric-loom.gradle.plugin/0.2.7-SNAPSHOT/fabric-loom.gradle.plugin-0.2.7-20200406.142940-30.jar

* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. Run with --scan to get full insights.

* Get more help at https://help.gradle.org

BUILD FAILED in 50s
复制代码
好奇的我开着上网道具用浏览器去看了一下maven.fabricmc.net，发现/fabric-loom/fabric-loom.gradle.plugin/0.2.7-SNAPSHOT/下面每个小版本有三个文件，分别是*.pom，*.pom.sha1和*.pom.md5，我百度了一下，gradle的二进制插件应该是*.jar，所以fabric-loom这个插件到底在哪里，还是说我的操作有什么问题？请大佬指教

4.17

我终于找到了正确的位置，不在
maven.fabricmc.net/fabric-loom/fabric-loom.gradle.plugin/0.2.7-SNAPSHOT/
而是在
maven.fabricmc.net/net/fabricmc/fabric-loom/0.2.7-SNAPSHOT/

但是如果我把settings.gradle里的url改成maven.fabricmc.net/net/fabricmc/的话，它又会跑到
maven.fabricmc.net/net/fabricmc/fabric-loom/fabric-loom.gradle.plugin/0.2.7-SNAPSHOT/
去找文件，可是这个文件夹就不存在
我尝试把jar下载到本地用mavenLocal()，但是还是显示找不到插件
求大佬指教

4.17晚

把.gradle\caches\modules-2\files-2.1里和fabric有关的东西全删了，重试build就正常了。。。可是我还是不知道问题的原因，更不知道怎么变正常的。。。
从--info给出的信息看，它一开始先跑去了maven.fabricmc.net/fabric-loom/fabric-loom.gradle.plugin/0.2.7-SNAPSHOT/下了一个maven-metadata.xml和*.pom，然后想下*.jar发现不存在，然后直接就跑到了正确的地址maven.fabricmc.net/net/fabricmc/fabric-loom/0.2.7-SNAPSHOT/开始下新的maven-metadata.xml，*.pom，然后下了一堆其他东西，然后开始下正确的*.jar，整个build花了54min左右
